evidence.source_document: Order Granting Plaintiffs’ Motion for a Temporary Restraining Order
evidence.text: This order enjoins the implementation of sections 19.50 and 19.20.080(C) of the San Rafael Municipal Code by Defendants until the hearing on the preliminary injunction motion is held.

evidence.source_document: Order Granting Plaintiffs’ Motion for a Temporary Restraining Order
evidence.text: This order enjoins the implementation of sections 19.50 and 19.20.080(C) of the San Rafael Municipal Code by Defendants until the hearing on the preliminary injunction motion is held.

extracted.value: enjoins the implementation of sections 19.50 and 19.20.080(C) of the San Rafael Municipal Code

evidence.source_document: Order Granting in Part and Denying in Part Plaintiffs’ Motion for Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: Specifically, while the City is permitted to break up the encampment at issue, the City must allow 400 square-foot encampments, housing up to four people, and may impose a 100-foot buffer between campsites instead of 200-foot buffer. The City must also ensure there is a process clearly identifying permissible sites and an orderly process by which such sites may be allocated or claimed.

extracted.value: The City must allow 400 square-foot encampments, housing up to four people, and may impose a 100-foot buffer between campsites instead of 200-foot buffer. The City must also ensure there is a process clearly identifying permissible sites and an orderly process by which such sites may be allocated or claimed.
